trans-unit.source: Manages the definition of the <see langword="IEnumConnectionPoints" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 管理 <see langword="IEnumConnectionPoints" /> 介面的定義。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `IEnumConnectionPoints` interface, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IEnumConnectionPoints`介面，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 原生程式碼的 COM 方法傳回的 HRESULT 時，common language runtime 會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the newly created enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含新建列舉值的參考。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the current one.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的列舉值，其包含與目前列舉值相同的列舉型別狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IEnumConnectionPoints::Clone`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IEnumConnectionPoints::Clone`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see langword="IConnectionPoint" /> references to return in <c>rgelt</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>rgelt</c> 中傳回之 <see langword="IConnectionPoint" /> 參考的數目。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the enumerated connections.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含列舉連接的參考。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the actual number of connections enumerated in <c>rgelt</c>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含 <c>rgelt</c> 中實際列舉連接數目的參考。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a specified number of items in the enumeration sequence.
trans-unit.target: 擷取列舉型別序列中指定的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="S_OK" /> if the <paramref name="pceltFetched" /> parameter equals the <paramref name="celt" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="S_FALSE" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="pceltFetched" /> 參數等於 <paramref name="celt" /> 參數，則為 <see langword="S_OK" />，否則為 <see langword="S_FALSE" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IEnumConnectionPoints::Next`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IEnumConnectionPoints::Next`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Resets the enumeration sequence to the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉序列重設為開頭。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IEnumConnectionPoints::Reset`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IEnumConnectionPoints::Reset`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to skip in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別中要略過的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Skips a specified number of items in the enumeration sequence.
trans-unit.target: 略過列舉序列中指定的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="S_OK" /> if the number of elements skipped equals the <paramref name="celt" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="S_FALSE" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果略過的元素數目等於 <paramref name="celt" /> 參數，則為 <see langword="S_OK" />，否則為 <see langword="S_FALSE" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IEnumConnectionPoints::Skip`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IEnumConnectionPoints::Skip`，請參閱 MSDN Library。
